import Header from '../Header' import CartListView from '../CartListView' import CartContext from '../../context/CartContext' import EmptyCartView from '../EmptyCartView' import './index.css' const Cart = () => ( {value => { const {cartList, removeAll} = value const showEmptyView = cartList.length === 0 const totalPriceList = cartList.map( eachItem => eachItem.price * eachItem.quantity, ) const overallTotalPrice = totalPriceList.reduce( (sum, currentValue) => sum + currentValue, 0, ) const onClickRemoveAll = () => { removeAll() } return ( <>
{showEmptyView ? ( ) : (

My Cart

<>

Order Total{' '} Rs {overallTotalPrice}/-

{cartList.length} items in cart

)}
) }} ) export default Cart
